info.title: Assistance API
info.description: This API helps the users to get connected with all DreamTec related services

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The request body for the operation

parameters.name: correlationId
parameters.description: This is a process correlation Id which all messages related to the same logical business process instance should carry

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: OAuth2 token pre shared with Encentivise or obtained by calling authentication services.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The system/component/service name of the requester/publisher

parameters.name: publishUTC
parameters.description: Populated by publisher/requester at the time the message is published or sent

parameters.name: messageType
parameters.description: When present indicates the type of message and determines the schema that the message payload conforms to

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: A unique identifier (UID) which identifies this specific message instance

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: The user name of the requesting user

202.description: The request is accepted for processing
